TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Opcode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Contains the values of the opcodes that denotes the frame type of the WebSocket frame.
Docs.remarks: The Opcode enumeration contains the values of the opcodes defined in RFC 6455 for the WebSocket protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.Opcode BINARY = unsigned int8(2)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 2. Indicates a binary frame.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.Opcode CLOSE = unsigned int8(8)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 8. Indicates a connection close frame.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.Opcode CONT = unsigned int8(0)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 0. Indicates a continuation frame.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.Opcode PING = unsigned int8(9)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 9. Indicates a ping frame.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.Opcode PONG = unsigned int8(10)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 10. Indicates a pong frame.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.Opcode TEXT = unsigned int8(1)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 1. Indicates a text frame.
